summary: Retexture for the mods craftable rugs. aswell as its windows and a drawing in its weaving corner.
descriptionHtml:
This file includes textures to replace the ones of the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8732/?]Cannabis skyrim mod[/url]. by MadNuttah and Virakotxa.

Namely:
3 craftable rugs, the windows, and one drawing in the weaving corner.

the directions in the skyrim/data folder are described as the foldernames of the file. So if you have cannabis skyrim installed and want to give it a fresh look give those a try. simply replace the .dds files.

there is a 2nd version of the "psychedelic rug" (rug01) so you can choose either the "dark brotherhood" themed or the "pazyryk"(oldest carped found irl)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i have to admit i did not ask for permission to upload those but since i do not reeaally upload their content i was like what the heck.
welll.. respect 2 [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2345988/?]MadNuttah[/url] and Virakotxa for their epic mod and relistic weed in it and if you decide to dl give them a like. Also these textures shall in no way and time ever be monetized. ty
bb peace
author: me
